author: Brian Lloyd
title: Life | Man writes epic rant to Cadbury's Ireland and their response was perfect
text:
You'll know that, in some cases, the amount of chocolate in Heroes can be shockingly dismal.
No doubt you've opened up a bag or box of them only to find a paltry amount inside. It's downright despicable, and one man had had enough. David Nugent took to Facebook to challenge Cadbury's Ireland about the level of chocolate with a puntastic rant.
Take a look.
To my friends at Cadburys,Let me begin by telling you the story of a pregnant woman. Until it was discovered that my...
Posted by Daniel Nugent on Wednesday, 21 October 2015
The post reached over 1,000 reactions and nearly 60 shares before Cadbury's Ireland stepped in and responded.
Heroes. Every last one of them.
Via Facebook
